txt.en:
'The hobbits in Oatbarton have a market every year at the Northcotton Farm. By now, word has usually spread to us of the event, and many will change their trip to Evendim to be sure to catch it.

'We have not yet heard anything from the Small Folk, and I am beginning to worry something is the matter or may have happened.

'Oatbarton is to the West of here on the southern border with the Shire. Once you get there, speak with the Bounder in charge of the town.'
'Well, I would certainly hope the market is still going to happen. I'm nearly out of pipe-weed!'
'I believe you might find the Farmer's Market in Oatbarton an interesting diversion.'
Every year the hobbits of Northcotton Farm, in Oatbarton, have a farmer's market.
Talk to Nod Gardener in Oatbarton
Oatbarton is in the Shire, on the southern border with Evendim.
